name: directory-of-podiatrists
description: Monorepo: Next.js frontend and NestJS backend for MVP

scripts.clean:all: rimraf node_modules client/node_modules server/node_modules && pnpm store prune
scripts.dev: concurrently -n "SERVER,CLIENT" -c "blue,green" --kill-others-on-fail "cd server && pnpm run start:dev" "cd client && pnpm run dev"
scripts.build: pnpm run build:server && pnpm run build:client
scripts.start: concurrently -n "SERVER,CLIENT" -c "blue,green" --kill-others-on-fail "cd server && pnpm run start:prod" "cd client && pnpm run start"
scripts.lint: pnpm run lint:server && pnpm run lint:client
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm --filter ./server run lint && pnpm --filter ./client run lint
scripts.test: pnpm run test:server && pnpm run test:client
scripts.typecheck: pnpm run typecheck:server && pnpm run typecheck:client
